meta.title: Table of Contents
meta.description: Table of contents of this website.

block.text: This is the table of contents or sitemap of this website.
There are shortcuts defined for the entries of the navigation menu. If your browser supports them, you can quickly access these entries by hitting "Alt + Digit" (

-Browser: first press "Shift + Esc", then "Digit"). Whereas "Digit" refers to a digit between 1 and 5. A digit is assigend to each entry of the menu, starting on the left with 1 ("Home"), 2 ("Contents") and so on until the last defined digit 5 ("About...") is reached.
